languages.text: {n}Игнорируя слова Джай, Владайм обращается только к вам.{/n} "Уверен, у Вашей Светлости была причина связаться с мелкой рыбешкой. Возможно, вас позабавили ложные обещания быстрой прибыли. Или более интимные аспекты подобных... отношений. В любом случае, это не мое дело. Просто помните, что по-настоящему хорошую сделку, достойную вашего внимания, могу обещать здесь только я".

traits.locale_text: {n}Игнорируя слова Джай, Владайм обращается только к вам.{/n} "Уверен, у Вашей Светлости была причина связываться с мелкой рыбешкой. Возможно, вас забавляют ложные обещания быстрой прибыли. Или более интимные аспекты подобных... отношений. В любом случае, это не мое дело. Лишь я способен предложить вам лучшую сделку. Но это вы и так знаете".

languages.text: {n}Ignoring Jae, Vladaym pointedly addresses you.{/n} "I'm sure Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} had reason for getting mixed up with a small fry like her. Perhaps you were amused by her false promises of quick profit. Or some more intimate aspects of such... relationships. In any case, that's none of my business. Just remember that, here on Footfall, the truly good deals worthy of your attention can only come from me."
languages.original_text: {n}Игнорируя слова Джай, Владайм обращается только к вам.{/n} "Уверен, у Вашей Светлости была причина связаться с мелкой рыбешкой. Возможно, вас позабавили ложные обещания быстрой прибыли. Или более интимные аспекты подобных... отношений. В любом случае, это не мое дело. Просто помните, что по-настоящему хорошую сделку, достойную вашего внимания, могу обещать здесь только я".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ignoring Jae, Vladaym pointedly addresses you.{/n} "I'm sure Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} had a reason for getting mixed up a small fry like her. Perhaps you were amused by false promises of quick profit. Or some more intimate aspects of such... relationships. In any case, that's none of my business. Just remember that the only good deals in this place that are worthy of your attention can only come from me."

languages.text: {n}ジェイを無視して、ヴラダイムはこちらに厳しい口調で話す。{/n}「陛下、あのような雑魚と関わった理由がおありなのだろう。おそらく、すぐに利益が出るという嘘の約束に心惹かれたのでは。あるいは、それよりももっと密接な…関係を武器に唆されたか。まぁ何にせよ、私には関係ないことだ。このフットフォールで、君のお気に召す本当に良い取引ができるのは、私だけということをお忘れなく」
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring Jae, Vladaym pointedly addresses you.{/n} "I'm sure Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} had reason for getting mixed up with a small fry like her. Perhaps you were amused by her false promises of quick profit. Or some more intimate aspects of such... relationships. In any case, that's none of my business. Just remember that, here on Footfall, the truly good deals worthy of your attention can only come from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイを無視して、ヴラダイムはこちらに厳しい口調で話す。{/n}「陛下、あのような雑魚と関わった理由がおありなのだろう。おそらく、すぐに利益が出るという嘘の約束に心惹かれたのでは。あるいは、それよりももっと密接な…関係を武器に唆されたか。まぁ何にせよ、私には関係ないことだ。このフットフォールで、君のお気に召す本当に良い取引ができるのは、私だけということをお忘れなく」

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆无视了婕伊，直直地转向你。{/n}“我相信，您和她这样的小人物厮混在一起，是有您的理由的。或许她快速盈利的虚假承诺让您觉得很有趣，又或许是出于某种更加……私密的关系。无论怎样，这都不关我的事。只希望您记住，在落脚港，真正值得您关注的好生意，只可能是从我这里来的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring Jae, Vladaym pointedly addresses you.{/n} "I'm sure Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} had reason for getting mixed up with a small fry like her. Perhaps you were amused by her false promises of quick profit. Or some more intimate aspects of such... relationships. In any case, that's none of my business. Just remember that, here on Footfall, the truly good deals worthy of your attention can only come from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆无视了婕伊，直直地转向你。{/n}“我相信，您和她这样的小人物厮混在一起，是有您的理由的。或许她快速盈利的虚假承诺让您觉得很有趣，又或许是出于某种更加……私密的关系。无论怎样，这都不关我的事。只希望您记住，在落脚港，真正值得您关注的好生意，只可能是从我这里来的。”

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, ignorando a Jae, se dirige a ti.{/n} «Estoy convencido de que {mf|milord|milady} tendría motivos para relacionarse con una cualquiera como ella. Quizás le divertirían sus falsas promesas de ganar dinero rápido u otros aspectos más íntimos de tales... relaciones. En cualquier caso, no es asunto mío. Usted recuerde que, aquí en Paso, los únicos negocios dignos de su atención solo puedo proponérselos yo».
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring Jae, Vladaym pointedly addresses you.{/n} "I'm sure Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} had reason for getting mixed up with a small fry like her. Perhaps you were amused by her false promises of quick profit. Or some more intimate aspects of such... relationships. In any case, that's none of my business. Just remember that, here on Footfall, the truly good deals worthy of your attention can only come from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym, ignorando a Jae, se dirige a ti.{/n} Estoy convencido de que {mf|milord|milady} tendría motivos para relacionarse con una cualquiera como ella. Quizás le divertirían sus falsas promesas de ganar dinero rápido u otros aspectos más íntimos de tales... relaciones. En cualquier caso, no es asunto mío. Usted recuerde que, aquí en Paso, los únicos negocios dignos de su atención solo puedo proponérselos yo».

languages.text: {n}Vladaym s'adresse à vous en ignorant ostensiblement Jae :{/n} « J'imagine que Votre Seigneurie a une bonne raison de fricoter avec ce genre de menu fretin. Vous vous êtes peut-être {mf|laissé|laissée} divertir par ses fausses promesses d'argent facile, à moins qu'elle vous ait {mf|convaincu|convaincue} par des méthodes plus... charnelles. Dans un cas comme dans l'autre, ça ne me regarde pas, mais n'oubliez pas qu'à Castel, les seules affaires qui méritent vraiment votre attention sont les miennes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring Jae, Vladaym pointedly addresses you.{/n} "I'm sure Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} had reason for getting mixed up with a small fry like her. Perhaps you were amused by her false promises of quick profit. Or some more intimate aspects of such... relationships. In any case, that's none of my business. Just remember that, here on Footfall, the truly good deals worthy of your attention can only come from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym s'adresse à vous en ignorant ostensiblement Jae :{/n} « J'imagine que Votre Seigneurie a une bonne raison de fricoter avec ce genre de menu fretin. Vous vous êtes peut-être {mf|laissé|laissée} divertir par ses fausses promesses d'argent facile, à moins qu'elle vous ait {mf|convaincu|convaincue} par des méthodes plus... charnelles. Dans un cas comme dans l'autre, ça ne me regarde pas, mais n'oubliez pas qu'à Castel, les seules affaires qui méritent vraiment votre attention sont les miennes. »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym ignoriert Jae und spricht demonstrativ dich an.{/n} "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} hatte bestimmt Gründe, sich mit einem so kleinen Fisch wie ihr abzugeben. Vielleicht amüsierten Euch ihre falschen Versprechungen vom raschen Profit. Oder die intimeren Aspekte derartiger ... Beziehungen. Wie dem auch sei, das geht mich nichts an. Vergesst nur nicht, dass die wirklich guten Geschäfte hier auf Footfall ausschließlich über mich kommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring Jae, Vladaym pointedly addresses you.{/n} "I'm sure Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} had reason for getting mixed up with a small fry like her. Perhaps you were amused by her false promises of quick profit. Or some more intimate aspects of such... relationships. In any case, that's none of my business. Just remember that, here on Footfall, the truly good deals worthy of your attention can only come from me."

Vielleicht amüsierten Euch ihre falschen Versprechungen vom raschen Profit. Oder die intimeren Aspekte derartiger ... Beziehungen. Wie dem auch sei, das geht mich nichts an. Vergesst nur nicht, dass die wirklich guten Geschäfte hier auf Footfall ausschließlich über mich kommen."

languages.text: {n}Jae'ı görmezden gelen Vladaym, doğrudan sana hitap ediyor.{/n} "Eminim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin böyle bir çapsıza bulaşmak için kendince nedenleri vardır. Belki kısa yoldan kâr elde etme vaatleriyle kandırdı sizi ya da... Daha samimi vaatlerde bulundu. Neyse, beni ilgilendirmez. Yeter ki Binliman'da ilginize layık, sahiden iyi anlaşmaların yalnızca benden gelebileceğini unutmayın."
languages.original_text: {n}Ignoring Jae, Vladaym pointedly addresses you.{/n} "I'm sure Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} had reason for getting mixed up with a small fry like her. Perhaps you were amused by her false promises of quick profit. Or some more intimate aspects of such... relationships. In any case, that's none of my business. Just remember that, here on Footfall, the truly good deals worthy of your attention can only come from me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ı görmezden gelen Vladaym, doğrudan sana hitap ediyor.{/n} "Eminim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinin böyle bir çapsıza bulaşmak için kendince nedenleri vardır. Belki köşeyi dönme vaatleriyle kandırdı sizi ya da... Daha samimi vaatlerde bulundu. Neyse, beni ilgilendirmez. Binliman'da dikkatinizi çekebilecek nitelikte hakikaten iyi malzemeleri sadece benden temin edebileceğinizi unutmayın yeter."
